content.html: Pre-commit hooks are a waste of time. Why? Because they enforce standards too early. Pre-commit hooks make us wait for a quality check on every commit.ðŸ‘Ž The code shouldn't need to be "right" to save my changes. The code only needs to be right before merge. Solution? Use CI.
content.value:
Pre-commit hooks are a waste of time.

Why? Because they enforce standards too early. Pre-commit hooks make us wait for a quality check on every commit.ðŸ‘Ž

The code shouldn't need to be "right" to save my changes.

The code only needs to be right before merge.

Solution? Use CI.
